Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: தன்துணை இன்றால் பகையிரண்டால் தான்ஒருவன் இன்துணையாக் கொள்கவற்றின் ஒன்று.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: He who is alone and helpless while his foes are two should secure one of them as an agreeable help (to himself).

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person stands alone, without any allies ('தன்துணை இன்றால்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: They are being threatened by two equally powerful enemies ('பகை இரண்டால்'), who are approaching from the left and the right.
Layered_Composition.Background: Instead of fighting both, the lone person is shown making a strategic choice. They turn to one of the enemies and extend a hand of friendship, offering an alliance. They are choosing to make one of the two threats into a welcome ally ('இன்துணையாக் கொள்கவற்றின் ஒன்று').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: If you are alone and have two enemies, the wise strategy is to turn one of them into a friend.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The classic 'stuck between two enemies' scenario. The key action is the strategic choice to offer alliance to one of them, rather than fighting a hopeless two-front war.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Strategic, diplomatic, a clever solution, survivalist.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A tense, dramatic lighting. The two enemies can be represented by opposing colors (e.g., red and blue). The act of offering friendship introduces a new, hopeful color into the scene.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A high-angle shot that shows the strategic triangle of the lone person and their two enemies.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: High-contrast lighting to emphasize the threat.

Cultural_Anchors: Alone with two enemies ('தன்துணை இன்றால் பகை இரண்டால்')
Make one of them a friend ('ஒன்று இன்துணையாக் கொள்க')
The 'enemy of my enemy is my friend' principle.

Flux_Optimized_Prompt.Negative_Prompt: person fighting both enemies, person surrendering, text artifacts.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the two enemies.
